name: Evolve!
description:
Explore the wonders of the sky, sea and Earth by evolving your animals to discover new ones!

Each place has different creatures great and small for you to find so make sure you unlock every one to build up your collection.

What are you waiting for, get evolving today and see what you can discover.

Evolve! Features:
- Simple Gameplay
- Various animals to discover
- Build up our collection
- Earn money from your animals
